name: Logistic Regression
title: Stochastic gradient descent tricks
author: Bottou, L{'e}on
chapter: Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade

parameter.name: learning_rate
parameter.description: The learning rate to use for the parameter vector update.

parameter.name: gradient_descent
parameter.description: A json object defining the stochastic gradient descent approach, which should be used to compute the gradient. The definition consists of an identifier, identifying the according approach and a json object defining the parameters of the approach, if there are any. For an example definition, take a look at the default configuration file for stochastic_gradient_descent.
